name: The Love Guide
description:
This is our entry for the Brakeys Game Jam #2 - theme: Love is Blind!

Developed by: Camila Canani and Joao Paulo Ruschel

3D Art, Animation, Voices: Camila Canani

Programming and Music: Joao Paulo Ruschel

Game Story:

Oh no! The people in the city have lost their loved ones! Can you help them find their soulmates?

Softwares:

  Unity 3D, Maya, Blender, Photoshop, Ableton Live 10

All assets, code, music, sfx, and models were done in the week between 16th and 23rd of Februrary 2019.

Camila Canani's Portfolio: https://www.artstation.com/camilacanani

OST available on: https://soundcloud.com/john-paulo-33/sets/loveguide-ost
